abstract: The company said that strong mobile device sales, new customers and revenue from subscribers drove growth in the quarter; it sold 5.1 million smartphones and added 320,000 contract subscribers.
snippet: The company said that strong mobile device sales, new customers and revenue from subscribers drove growth in the quarter; it sold 5.1 million smartphones and added 320,000 contract subscribers.
lead_paragraph: As much as people seem to complain about their phone company, they are willing to give it more money anyway.

headline.main: AT&T Posts Higher Profit and Holds On to Its Subscribers
headline.print_headline: AT&T Posts Higher Profit and Holds On to Its Subscribers
